skillTestContent.all: Jest / Enzyme, Cypress / testCafe / NightWatch, eslint

skillLangContent.zh: 國語, 台語, 英文(多益 830)

en: +6 years of experience as a project manager. (became a team leader within 2 years)
+4 years of experience as a frontend developer. (became a team leader within 2 years)
Deep understanding of modern web technologies, especially about React.js & Vue.js.
Familiar with the testing tools & frameworks. (eslint, Jest, Enzyme, Typescript, NightWatch, Cypress)
Highly recognized by the manager: 1st rank in annual assessment both as a PM or developer
Passionate about programming: spend +20 hours every week to learn new technologies
Responsible: never blame others when the result isn't as we expected. The only thing I care about is how much I can do to make sure we can reach our goal
Fast learner: able to learn the techniques in short time and start contributing to the company
Great leadership: devote to create a great working environment for my team, be transparent and make sure all members are able to keep improving their skills
Team player: love to co-work with different people, willing to share my ideas and also love to listen to others' opinions
Love sharing: share everything I learn with my team and write articles to share with the community constantly
zh: +6 年專案經理工作經驗 (2年內晉升為課級主管)
+4 年前端工程師開發經驗 (2年內晉升為前端團隊主管)
熟悉網頁開發技術，擅長 React.js 與 Vue.js
熟悉測試工具與框架，包含 eslint, Jest, Enzyme, Typescript, NightWatch, Cypress
於專案經理與前端工程師期間，均曾獲得年度績效考核全部門第一的肯定
對程式設計具備高度熱忱，每週投入 +20 小時於新技術學習
有責任感，不將失敗歸咎他人，專注在自己能如何讓團隊達成目標
能在短時間內熟悉新技術/框架，為團隊與公司提供貢獻
具備領導能力，致力於為團隊建立良好的工作環境與氛圍，保持資訊透明，確保團隊成員都能持續學習進步
具備團隊精神，願意分享個人想法，也樂於聆聽其他成員的不同看法
樂於分享，持續與團隊成員分享新知，並持續撰寫文章分享於網路社群

en: manage over 10 projects, in charge of the new version release and deal with the production issues
using puppeteer to create automatic tools, simplify the deploy process
recruit and mentor team members (5 members)
implement PR review to enhance the code quality
co-work with devOps to implement the GitLab CI/CD process
implement image compression and code splitting to reduce the CDN cost
develop AMP news channel, enhance SEO and mobile UX
finish online course platform within 2 months
create auto screenshot tool by using AWS lambda and puppeteer, dynamically generate og:image to optimize the social media sharing feature
stock, forex, index data integration and virtualization: HightChart, TradingView, custom SVG chart
Social media platform for investor
develop the subscription system and integrate 3rd party payment service
website refactoring, from .NET to React.js with SSR
zh: 管理前端超過 10 個專案開發進度、推版與解決線上問題
使用 puppeteer 開發自動化工具，提高推版作業效率
負責前端團隊 (5人) 招募與培訓，完善線上文件提高新人學習效率
落實 PR review 並建立良好的討論風氣，確保團隊能相互學習持續成長
開發流程改善，與 devOps 合作規劃與測試 GitLab CI/CD 流程
成本改善，導入縮圖機制與 code splitting，大幅降低 CDN 成本
新聞頻道導入 AMP，明顯提升網站 SEO 並改善 mobile 使用體驗
兩個月內完成線上課程平台開發並上線
使用 AWS lambda, puppeteer 開發網站自動截圖工具，動態產生 og:image 優化社群分享功能
國內外股市、外匯、指數等投資資訊源串接與視覺化呈現：HightChart, TradingView, 客制 SVG chart
開發投資社群平台
開發會員訂閱功能與金流串接
開發區塊鏈身份識別應用
將舊版 .NET 網站逐步轉為 React (SSR) 架構

en: Travel Planning Application：refactor from jQuery to React.js
implement unit test
implement WebSocket and Firebase
using Redux-Saga to implement background data synchronize mechanism to enhance UX
zh: 行程規劃系統：將 jQuery 版本重構成 React.js
導入單元測試
串接 WebSocket & Firebase
透過 Redux-Saga 實現背景資料同步機制，改善使用體驗

en: Social Platform: finish instant message and itinerary booking system within 2 months
Online Shop: co-work with designer, redesign the website for our new watch
zh: 潛水社交平台：兩個月內完成即時聊天系統與行程訂購功能
潛水錶線上購物網站：與設計合作完成新錶上市的網站改版
